metadata.title: CVE-2018-7440 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Leptonica through 1.75.3. The gplotMakeOutput function allows command injection via a $(command) approach in the gplot rootname argument. This issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2018-3836.

criterions.comment: leptonlib package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.75.3-3').
